name: Nervos Network
intro: Layer1 public chain ecosystem based on PoW consensus
introduce: The Nervos Network is a layer-1 public blockchain ecosystem that uses Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus and supports smart contract development. It also consists of a series of layer-2 scaling solutions to facilitate high-volume use cases. Nervos' native token (CKByte or CKB) allows users and developers to claim storage space on the Nervos blockchain in proportion to their holdings.
